snippet.title: GetsuFumaDen: Undying Moon Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Nintendo Switch 『GetsuFumaDen: Undying Moon』 Available Now！

Inspired by the Japanese ukiyo-e art style, the world of GetsuFumaDen: Undying Moon is as beautiful as it is deadly...

Vibrant, dynamic 2D animations bring the artistic world of GetsuFumaDen to life in an intense roguelike hack-and-slash action game!

Emerge victorious from brutal, larger than life boss battles and descend deeper into the depths of Hell to eradicate the source of the cataclysm.

*This video has been translated into the following languages.
Français/Italiano/Deutsch/Español

Get more information here:
https://www.konami.com/games/getsufumaden/jp/ja/

My Nintendo Store
https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/GetsuFumaDen-Undying-Moon-1951317.html

Follow the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/agecheck/app/1323470/

Get the latest news on the game here:
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/GetsuFumaDen_EN
Official Discord: https://discord.gg/JrQ6x5P9hM
